homeHeader.title: Organise Your Records, Prepare Your Returns, and File Your Corporate Taxes Smoothly with Full 360° Corporate Tax Support
homeHeader.description: Struggling with late filings, costly errors, unexpected audits, and fast-approaching tax deadlines? At One Nexuz, we simplify corporate tax registration and filing, from filing to compliance management, streamlining all the paperwork, minimising the risk of penalties, and ensuring you stay fully compliant. Protect your cash flow, strengthen financial resilience, avoid government audits, and drive business growth while our experts manage deadlines and compliance.

items.question: Who needs to register for corporate tax in the UAE?
items.answer: All UAE-based businesses, including mainland companies, free zone entities, and offshore branches, must register if their taxable income exceeds the FTA thresholds.

items.question: What documents do I need to register for corporate tax?
items.answer: Typically, you’ll need a trade license, passport copies of owners, Emirates IDs, and proof of business address.

items.question: How long does corporate tax registration take?
items.answer: It generally takes 1 to 14 days, depending on document readiness and FTA processing times.

items.question: Do Free Zone companies have to pay corporate tax?
items.answer: You can qualify for corporate tax exemptions if you meet a Free Zone’s taxation requirements. Our experts assess your eligibility to help maximise tax benefits.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help recover input VAT?
items.answer: Yes! We provide end-to-end filing services and year-round advisory support to keep your business compliant.
